@deathschaos9 wrote:

if(args.length == 8)
That is saying that your command has to look like this
::checkip 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8

item.title: Am I doing this wrong?
item.dc:creator: @TheKidXXX TheKidXXX
item.description:
@TheKidXXX wrote:

I think I am doing this wrong…compiles fine but it just doesn’t work.

So what am I doing wrong?

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipcheck”) && playerRights > 1)
{
String[] args = command.split(" ");
if(args.length == 8)
{
String otherPName = args[1];
String otherPName2 = args[2];

		int otherPIndex =  PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
		int otherPIndex2 = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName2);

		if (otherPIndex2  != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			client p2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex2];

	if (p.playerLastConnect == p2.playerLastConnect){
	sM(" "+p2.playerName+" Ip matches "+p.playerName+" ");
	} else {
		  sM(" "+p2.playerName+" and "+p.playerName+" Ip's do not match ");
		   }
			 sM("wrong1");
	}
	sM("wrong2");
	}
	  sM("wrong3");

}
[/code]

Read full topic
